Chapter.Line: I found the private testing chambers by accident and had to take a look.
It was something out of one of those 21st century sci-fi films.
Huge vats of liquids held naked bodies suspended in various
states of degeneration. I found Tito and Gabrielle, their
faces nearly intact but not much else. Something had stopped
the breakdown near their heads, some sort of dark liquid.
The last vat was swimming with that same liquid.
Whoever that was obviously reacted violently to the tests,
and something new was growing inside the tissue.
I have to find out what Fastian is trying to accomplish.
Here's to good fortune and seeing you again, brother. Retired officer or not.
